alert.note: Alert for Dubuque; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Carroll, Jo Daviess, southwestern Stephenson, north central Jackson and southeastern Dubuque Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Galena, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Schapville around 535 PM CDT. Hanover and Elizabeth around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Woodbine and Massbach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
